metadata.title: CVE-2025-21699 linux
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:  gfs2: Truncate address space when flipping GFS2_DIF_JDATA flag  Truncate an inode's address space when flipping the GFS2_DIF_JDATA flag: depending on that flag, the pages in the address space will either use buffer heads or iomap_folio_state structs, and we cannot mix the two.
